#BlackMagicCraft #Episode203 #Warhammer

Yup, so this very cool Striggore model from Wicked Foundations got crudded up to become my Deamon Prince of Nurgle in my Warhammer 40k army!

They've got a whole bunch of very cool, and very weird, plastic miniatures you can get and use in whatever game you want! Check out the project here and jump in on a late pledge: https://www.gameontabletop.com/cf277/tales-of-terror-5e-miniatures-book.html

title: Converting a HUGE D&D model for my Warhammer 40K Nurgle army
